column2: China locks foreign investors out of another bad-debt cleanup HONG KONG
column3: Sept 9 Chinese banks have a colossal mess of bad debts to clean up for the second time in as many decades
column4: but they are unlikely to call in the financial world's most efficient mop and broom. ~

column2: UPDATE 2-Neiman Marcus close to changing private equity owners -sources NEW YORK
column3: Sept 8 A consortium of Ares Management LLC and the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board is in advanced talks to acquire upscale U.S. retailer Neiman Marcus Inc from TPG Capital LP
column4: Warburg Pincus LLC and Leonard Green Partners LP
column5: two people familiar with the matter said on Sunday. ~
